sentences.english: Chengdu hundred companies under the letter of the Electrical and Mechanical Company, Xichang wishful Trading Company.
sentences.chinese: 公司下設成都百信機電公司，西昌如意商貿有限公司。

sentences.english: Xichang is a sprawling and bustling city, yet more subdued and slower-paced than Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 西昌是個不太有規劃的城市，人羣熙攘。

sentences.english: Xichang is the site of one of Chinas main satellite launch centers.
sentences.chinese: 西昌是中國一主要衛星發射中心所在地。

sentences.english: Daqiaoguo is located at the lower reaches of Guandi hydropower station in Xichang, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大橋溝位於四川省西昌市擬建官地水電站大壩下游。

sentences.english: Sino-Italy joint venture, Xichang Fovalley Food Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 西昌富萬利食品有限公司是中意合資的股份制企業。

sentences.english: The probe took off from the Xichang Satellite Launch Centre in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 探測器是從四川省地西昌衛星發射中心發射起飛的。
